name: WordPress Animated Text Plugin
author: ProFaceOff

sections.description:
Animate headlines and text with ease using our friendly UI and shortcode.

WordPress Animated Text Features

WordPress Animated Text Plugi offers the following features:

Easy to apply animated effect

We create the short code that helps you to apply the effect to your text in the pages or posts.
sections.installation:
There are 2 easy ways to install our plugin:

1.The standard way

  • In your WordPress Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add
  • Search for “WordPress Animated Text Plugin”
  • Click to install
  • Activate the plugin
  • Link to WordPress files

2.The nerdy way

  • Download the plugin (.zip file) on the right column of this page
  • In your WordPress Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add
  • Select the tab “Upload”
  • Upload the .zip file you just downloaded
  • Activate the plugin
  • Link to WordPress files
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Add pop up that user can choose the effect
  • Generate the shortcode that help to apply effect to the posts/pages content.
